name: midnight (itch)
description:
midnight is a short shoot 'em up created for GBJAM5.

Downloading is recommended. A Windows zip file is provided for your convenience. If you wish to download the cross-platform .love file format, you must install LÖVE 0.10.1 in order to run the game.

Playing

Use the arrow keys to move your ship, and hold Z to fire (or its equivalent on a non-American or non-QWERTY keyboard.)

Press escape to return to the menu, or to quit the game.
